Fayetteville.March F. Riddle Center: The March F. Riddle Center is a multi-purpose arena on the campus of Methodist University in Fayetteville, North Carolina. With a capacity of 1,300 people, it is home to the Methodist Monarchs college basketball and volleyball teams in the NCAA Division III USA South Athletic Conference. It was also home to the Carolina Cougarz of the Continental Basketball League for their only year in the league.
